Late last week CBS announced the official air date and time for season one of THE INSPECTORS.  The first episode will air at 10:30am ET on Saturday, October 3rd.  I'll make sure to post a reminder as it gets closer.  

Nearly all of the actors that will appear on the show were cast out of the southeast.  Probably a first for a show that will air on CBS.  

http://www.tvinsider.com/article/31422/cbs-adds-new-crime-drama-and-some-chicken-soup-to-saturday-mornings/

THV11's CBS affiliate WREG reports that Tremaine Wilbourn, the man wanted for murder of a Memphis police officer, has been added to the Tennesee Bureau of Investigation's Top Ten Most Wanted List.

Details: http://on.kthv.com/1E4O6GX
He killed over less than two grams of marijuana. The officer he murdered is the latest casualty of the (failed) war on drugs.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY: U.N.C.L.E. ACTOR -
Jay Waverly North (born August 3, 1951) is an American actor. Beginning a prolific career as a child actor at the age of six, he became a household name during the early 1960s for his role as the well-meaning but mischievous Dennis Mitchell on the CBS comedy Dennis the Menace. He performed once on MFU in The Deadly Toys Affair, 1965.
And the never-mentioned but much-loved Maya, when he was a teenager

Wonderful to see again.
Maya also starred one of my childhood crushes, Sajid Kahn!
